name: Downslide
description:
# Downslide

Go as deep as you can in an endless runner inspired by downwell.

Final Score = Depth + Total Gems

100 Gems = 1 Heart

----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (they make a lot more sense once you play honest):

arrow keys: dash

while dashing:

 - arrow in dash direction = forward strike

 - arrow opposite to dash direction = down strike

eg.

 - your on the left wall
  - press right to dash

 - your dashing right

  - press right for forward strike

  - press left for down strike

escape: pause

r : restart

----------------------------------------------------------------

 - Music   :[Marllon Silva](https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack)

Thank you so much for playing!! I know its very rough but all feedback is really apreciated!!
